name: LITTLE KNITTED JEWELS
description: Edited by Kara Warner For knitters who love crossover crafting projects, this book combines leftover scrap yarn, wire, beads, and embroidery floss in 12 mixed-media jewelry projects from expert designers. This how-to book features step-by-step tutorials and walks the knitter through several useful techniques such as knitting with beads, working in the round, knitting with wire, and more.

name: NECLACES BRADED PN THE KUMIHIMO DISK BY KAREN DESOUSO
description: Karen DeSousa's second kumihimo book has more of everything. More braids. More patterns. More necklaces. More great tips for making and finishing beautiful braids. It's suitable for beginners and challenging enough for more experienced braiders.

name: Kumihimo Bobbins 85 gm
description: USE WITH THE KUMIHIMO WOOD LOOM.  SOLD IN SETS OF 8.

name: CREATIVE KUMIHIMO BY JACQUI CAREY
description: This book contains advanced patterns for the Marudai, using 4, 8 and 16 tamas (bobins). Once you understand that the kumihimos in the pictures are described at the end of the book you're good to go. The patterns let you see how the colors will affect the results and plan ahead to get the effect you desire.

name: KUMIHIMO WEIGHT
description:
USE FOR MAKING BRAID AS A COUNTER BALANCE AND HELPS TO TIGHTEN THE THE CORD.  USE WITH THE DISC OR THE STAND.
CLAMP ON TO CORD EASILY AND VERY DECORATIVE.

name: INTERLOCKING THREAD WINDERS
description:
INTERLOCKING THREAD WINDERS, Small w/ Large Hole $6.50 
A 1-3/4" small soft plastic bobbin with 5/8" hole (excellent for holding on finger while winding) that snaps open for easy thread winding then snaps back closed to hold the thread in place for controlled release. These bobbins have an interlocking ring that allows multiple bobbins to be snapped together. Ideal for working on kumihimo braiding boards, crochet lace, etc. Sold in packs of 10

name: ROUND BEAD SMITH KUMIHIMO DISK
description:
KUMI HIMO BRAIDING BOARD, 6" ROUND.
A hand held, 6" round 32 slot rigid high density poly board for hand braiding Requires no weights, maintains position of all threads, light weight and portable. Suitable for kumi-himo and other multi-strand techniques. Includes instructions in English

name: KUMIHIMO THE ESSENCE OF JAPANESE BRADING BY AIKO SAKAI AND MAKIKO TADA
description:
The confluence of spirit and thread defies the complexity of Kumihimo, the traditional Japanese braid. As an object of beauty as well as honor, the braid also has a role in utility and fashion.

In this advanced work, braid construction is explored using the instruments for creation, the marudai, the kakudai, and the ayatakedai diagrams and basic instructions.

name: NECKLACES BRADED ON THE KUMIHIMO DISK BY KAREN DESOUSA
description: Necklaces Braided on the Kumihimo Disk is a step-by-step instruction book that tells you how to make and finish a stunning array of necklaces. Whether you are a beginner or advanced braider this book has something for you. It includes move by move instructions for four braids. The section on braiding with beads shows you how to add beads of all sizes to your necklaces without ruining your disk. Fancy finishes shows you how to dress up the closures. From project inception to the final touch, this book will inspire you to create your own stunning necklaces.

name: JAPANESE BRAIDING THE ART OF KUMIHIMO BY JACQUI CAREY
description: The traditional Japanese craft of Kumihimo is clearly explained in this hands-on resource that is suitable for beginners but also offers enough complexity for seasoned braiders.

name: TECH SQUARE AFGHAN BY JOANNE CLARK
description:
12 skill-building squares in a 52 page booklet


Designed to give both old and new knitters a chance to try skills they may have found intimidating or that they simply want to try on a smaller scale before attempting a whole garment.
Shown in Harmony 10 ply with accents of red Perendale. 
The complete afghan requires approximately 27 skeins of Harmony (110 yds per 50 gr) and 2 skeins of Perendale for contrast. 
To make the afghan as pictured requires the following amounts of each color. 
Harmony #800 - 3; #801 - 4; #802 - 6; #803 - 11; #804 - 3.
Perendale #82 - 2.

name: ITTY-BITTY TOYS BY SUSAN B ANDERSON
description: ITTY-BITTY TOYS BY SUSAN B ANDERSON Toys are a great project to make for kids.  Beginners can easily knit these projects picking up additional skills along the way.  make a great gift for that little one.

options.name: ITTY-BITTY TOYS BY SUSAN B ANDERSON

name: SLOTS AND HOLES BY LIZ GIPSON
description: Learn to warp your rigid-heddle loom with Liz Gipson who will show you three different techniques for a quick a successful warp. The first time you warp a rigid heddle loom in just 20 minutes, the light goes on. This simple, clever loom is ideal for making cloth fast! For getting a project ready to weave in no time flat! But there's more to it than that. Master these three ways to warp, and you'll be prepared to weave anything from simple plain fabric to complex stripes or plaids to fine fabrics you thought were only possible on a floor loom. Liz Gipson has taught scores of people the joys of the rigid heddle, and in the process has developed simple approaches that make sense. You'll feel comfortable with her down-home explanations and reassured by her common-sense ways of working. Slots and Holes is loaded with tricks and tips and know-how, from why it's good to have an arsenal of scissors, to how to warp with two yarns at once and save half your time.

name: WEAVING MADE EASY BY LIZ GIPSON
description: Weaving, one of the fastest ways to produce cloth, is thoroughly explained in this simple guide to the age-old craft. A perfect blend of ease and functionality, the small, portable rigid heddle loom can be used to easily produce loose, drape-friendly fabric as well as dense, sturdy material. Eighteen projects—for scarves, bags, belts, tops, and a bevy of household goodies such as pillows, rugs, and blankets—explore how to combine colors and create textured fabrics using a variety of techniques. Additional tips on adding crocheted edges, beaded fringe, and needle-felted flowers are also included.

name: KNIT DISHCLOTHS BY JULIE RAY
description: Julie Ray has desighed thses great discloths knitted in cotton after quilt patterns.  They are simpel and wonderful projects for biginners.

name: KNITTED TOYS BY ZOE MELLORIS
description: KNITTED TOYS BY ZOE MELLORIS is a great range of 25 toys to knit for a youngster.

name: CARDIGANS CLOSURES BY MALISSA LEAPMAN
description: Containing 7 captivating designs, this handbook provides tips, tricks, and trade secrets for creating cardigans and the perfect closures.

name: RUNWAY KNITS BY JUSTIN WILLIAM LIN
description: RUNWAY KNITS BY JUSTIN WILLIAM LIN.  Fabulous designer patterns offered in this book by well known Berta Karapetyan, founder of katabella Yarns.  She is known for creating knitwear for Donna Karan, Ralph Lauren, and Calvin Klein.

options.name: RUNWAY KNITS BY JUSTIN WILLIAM LIN

name: HANDS ON RIGID HEDDLE WEAVING
description:
HANDS ON RIGID HEDDLE WEAVING BY BETTY LINN DAVENPORT
The rigid heddle loom is light, portable and particularly suited for 2-harness weaves. Despite its almost toy-like appearance, beautiful fabrics can be woven on it, as the author so well demonstrates. She starts off by telling you to select a loom, then goes on to warping it and weaving on it. She discusses sett, balanced weave, weft-emphasis and weft-faced fabrics, warp-emphasis and warp-faced fabrics, surface textures, and tapestry. If you want to start weaving with a very small investment, this is the way to go. Very well-illustrated in black & white and color.

name: DOMINO KNITTING DVD BY VIVIAN HOXBRO
description:
DOMINO KNITTING BY VIVIAN HOXBRO IS AN GREAT INSTRUCTIONAL DVD.
Join knitwear designer and teacher Vivian Hoxbro to learn the step-by-step process of domino knitting, a knitting technique with a rich history. 

With triangles, squares, and variations of both shapes of knitted fabric, you can create one-of-a-kind pieces by joining them together, hence the name domino knitting. 

With this workshop video, you'll learn:

The basics of domino knitting, such as casting on for this special technique. 
How to knit squares in one and two colors, partial squares, stripes, and even three-dimensional flower and cone shapes. 
How to join domino shapes to form purses, towels, and knitwear. 
Ideas for incorporating shapes into your own more advanced designs. 
And more!

name: CAST ON BIND OFF BY LESLIE BESTOR
description: Discover the perfect beginning and ending for every knitting project! This one-of-a-kind reference presents more than 50 ways to cast on and bind off, creating edges that are tighter, looser, stretchier, lacier, longer-lasting, prettier--whatever your project needs, you'll find it here.

name: PATTERNS FOR KNITTED HATS
description: PATTERNS FOR KNITTED HATS BY BETY LAMPEN gives instructions for a basic hat attern in 4 sizes.  The instructions are flexable.  Size 8 US needles and worsted weight yarn are used in this book.  Most of the book has darling graphs and photo designs of the hats.  It is a paperback pamphlet.

name: CREATIVE WEAVING BY SARA HOWARD
description: Creative Weaving by Sarah Howard and E Kendrick gives all the ideas to weave and express oneself. It is loaded with a lot of color and texture. The examples allow one to substitute one’s own yarn and material.

name: ITTY-BITTY NURSERY BY SUSAN B ANDERSON
description: Baby sets and toys; jackets and mittens; and a pure and sweet layette are just the tip of the knitting frenzy that is Itty-Bitty Nursery. Projects like Peas and Carrots and Dotted Chickens will brighten up any nursery—and induce giddiness in adults. There are easy-to-knit pleasing pacifer clips, stroller blankets, appealing sweaters, and cozy slippers for babies and toddlers to wear in comfort, as well as delectable toys for playtime and handy items for parents who cherish their babies.

name: GLIMAKRA SUSANNA RIGID HEDDLE LOOM
description:
The loom frame is sturdy, but very portable. The back of the frame can be made into a warping frame for winding your warp. Just turn it upside down and insert the dowels.

Susanna is made from birch and has an inside width of 70 cm (27"). 

It comes with lease sticks, two long flat shuttles, 15 beaming sticks, and a 10 ends per inch heddle. Included are a warping frame on the back of the loom and two clamps if you wish to secure the Susanna to a table top. A 10 ends per inch heddle and a floor stand are also available.

name: GLIMAKRA EMILA RIGID HEDDLE LOOM 13 inch
description: The Emilia is a portable, folding rigid heddle loom that weaves 13 inches wide. Rigid heddle looms are a good easy way to learn to weave. This incredible new loom is made of birch, is lightweight and folds for portability. It includes a 10 dent heddle, shuttle, warping peg, two clamps, sley hook and a threader. The heddle is held by brackets, so it is secure for easier weaving and will not topple over when you are weaving. The ingenius locking of the loom frame provides a tensioning device which always give you even tension on your warp. Sturdy metal ratchets, with many teeth give you the tension you need. With the written instructions, you can be weaving in a short time. There are extra heddles and a heddle kit available.  SEE WEAVING.

name: 28 INCH KNITTINGBOARD KIT
description:
Our Knitting Boards are made from 100% hardwood, with ball tipped metal pins. Each board has patented recessed knitting surface for ease of lifting the yarn, and adjustable wood spacers of 1/2", 1", and 1-1/4" settings to separate the boards and achieve many different effects. The steel pins are spaced just 5/16" apart for easy knitting- 84 pins for 84 double stitches.  You can use all the pins or just a few depending on your project.  The maximum knitting width of this board is aprox 30"-45" depending on the yarn and spacers being used. 
This board is required in making the boot kit that is offered in the AUTHENTIC KNITTING BOARD and KIT sections.
Kit Includes:

name: PAUME ORGANIC COTTON-SELECT YARNS
description:
100% ORGANIC COTTON FROM JAPAN
Free from herbicides, pesticides and other agrochemicals for three years under strict observation. It is much softer than normal cotton and good for you and the environment. * Colored yarns are dyed with natural plant-derived colors.

*Because no chemicals are used, the yarn retains its hallow space within the strand when spun, thus even after washing, the yarn keeps its light weight nature. It is warm in winter and cool in summer

*These organic cottons may lose color due to UV exposure or washing over time. The colored yarn is more resistant to UV damage from the sun. Wash in cool water and dry flat

25 g/73 m/skein FROM JAPAN.

name: FIELD ORGAINIC WOOL-SELECT YARNS
description:
The sheep's field has to be free from herbicides, pesticides and other agrochemicals for more than 3 years.  The sheep itself has to be as natural as possible. They must have strong immune systems, not dependent on medicines to illnesses.  Based on meeting the requirements above, ranches are tested every year and certified by the ACO Organization publication.Only metalic free dye material is used.

Food additives approved by food sanitation law, are added to soften the yarn further.

name: TOY PATTERNS
description:
1-BUNNY HOP
This cute and quirky bunny family is waiting to decorate your spring table or to delight the young or the young at heart. Made in worsted wt yarn the large bunnies are 8-1/2" tall and the small bunnies are 7" tall (measured from bottom to ear-tip). 
2-SNO BUDDY FAMILY
Adorable little snow-people, all playing dress-up for the cold. Five versions to knit in worsted wt singles, heavy worsted, or Aran wt yarns. SnoBuddies range in height from 7" (large) to 5-1/2" (small) to 3" (baby). 
3-PREHISTORIC PALS
Whimsical, adorable, little dinosaurs, just the right size for little hands to hug. Four versions to knit in worsted wt singles, heavy worsted, or Aran wt yarns: Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Brachiosaurus, and Tyrannosaurus rex. Prehistoric Pals range in height from 6" to 10", seated.
4-SAFARI FRIENDS
Huggable, tote-able, adorable, stuffed friends just the right size for your favorite tot. Pattern includes all four friends (each with his Swahili name): Tembo (elephant), Simba (lion), Punda milia (zebra), and Twiga (giraffe), to make in natural or whimsical colors like ours. Worsted wt singles, heavy worsted, or Aran wt yarns. Safari Friends range in height from 8" to 10".

Yarn Requiremets: Pride 8ply (DK) 100% merino 9 (10, 10, 11, 12, 13) 50 gr skeins.

name: BEADED BRACELETS TO KNIT BY LEASURE ARTS
description:
BEADED BRACELETS TO KNIT BY LEASURE ARTS has 15 bracelet designs.  They are easy, fast, and fun.

THE KNITTED FARMYARD BY HANNELORE WERNHARD is a knitting classic.  The instructions for all the animals and people are easy that beginners can very nicely follow.  a pattern coming soon will be offered for a baby blanket inspired by this book.

options.name: BEADED BRACELETS TO KNIT BY LEASURE ARTS
THE KNITTED FARMYARD BY HANNELORE WERNHARD

name: LION BRAND PAMPHLETS
description:
Each book is filled with different, fashionable patterns that are easy
to make.

name: SWEATER PATTERNS
description:
1-WISTERIA
 is in four sizes: S(30-32-34), M(36-38-40), L(42-44-46), and XL(48-50-52). Heavy worsted weightt yarns are required as well as  24" and 16" circular needles size US 8 (5.0mm). 
2-SWINING IN BLUE
I-cord piping adds definitive punch to this flattering short take on a swing coat, to work up quickly in a heavy worsted yarn. Not feeling especially blue? Make it in yourfavorite color! In five sizes: XS(30), S(34), M(38), L(42), and XL(46).
3-TRIPPLE TWEED VEST
Three tweedy yarns and an all-over tweed stitch pattern combine to create this casual-day topper. A knitted-on I-cord trim and rustic buttons complete the look. Slightly oversized fit in XS(34"), S(36"), M(40"), L(44"), and XL(48").

name: BABY PATTERNS
description:
1-SWEET PEA
Knit these "little things" for an expectant mother and she'll appreciate their practicality almost as much as their luxury. Cap and sacque are embellished with simple bands of reverse stockinet. In one size: Newborn to 12 lbs. 
2-TED
The cutest baby bear on the block (with or without ears)! A raglan hoody and leggings to knit in a worsted wt wool or blend. And this hood really fits! In three sizes: S (6-9 mos.), M (9-12 mos.), and L (12-18 mos.)

name: FELTED IPOD CASE KIT
description: 1- The pattern is especially designed for The Knitting Nest by Cookie Williams.  The kit includes one skein of Tillie Tomas Flurries color Lilies which is 100% merino wool with glass beads, one 3/4" button, one beading sewing needle, instructions.  Other items required are size 4 US needle, very small crochet hook for pulling beads to right side.

name: HAT PATTERNS
description:
1-A BERRY CUTE HAT requires 50 yards of green and 95 yards of a berry color in worsted weight yarn.

2-The BRAID AND BOBBLE HAT requires260 yards of worsted weight yarn.

3-The SWIRLS HAT is worsted weight and uses 170 yards of one color and 70 yards of another.  

4-EVERYONE'S FAVORITE HAT AND SCARF uses 90 yards of super bulky yarn for the hat.  All hats are wonderful and interesting to knit.

5- This hat is designed Cookie Williams for The Knitting Nest, a great project for beginners.   Guys like this hat because it isn't too bulky to wear under helmets and it is warm.  Made of 100% New Zealand wool, Harmony, color dark gray.  The project takes two skeins of yarn and the pattern is free upon purchase of yarn.  See Harmony.

name: MORE SCARF PATTERNS
description:
1- A lovely scarf designed by Evelyn a Clark for Fiber Trends.  The scarf is made of a made of fine mohair/silk blend.  It is a very attractive look.

2- A lovely lace scarf designed by Cookie Williams.  It is made with one skein of Karabella Gossamer Yarn and The pattern is FREE along with the order of the Gossamer yarn.  See Karabella Yarn

name: SWEATER PATTERNS
description:
1- ANGORA CAPLET SWEATER PATTERN- This lovely pattern is made up Karabella Chloe.  See Karabella Yarn.  It requires; small- 9 skeins and size 3-6 US needles; medium- 9 skeins and size 4 and 7 US needles; large- 10 skeins and size 6 and 9 US needles.  All sizes require a size 6 US 16 inch circular needle.  This is offered as a kit.  See kits.

2- TRAVELING CABLE CARDIGN- This pattern is made with 13, 14, or 15 skeins of very soft Karabella’s Aurora 8.  The sizes are small, medium, and large respectively.  It requires:  size 7 US needles, cable needle, stitch marker, and 3 buttons.  The difficulty scale is high.

3- WAIKIKI VEST PATTERN-An exclusive pattern designed by Cookie Williams for the Knitting Nest.  It is offered in sizes 34-48.  Uses Waikiki yarn; color sherbet; 6 skeins for size 34; 7 skeins for 36-40; 8 skeins for 42-46; 9 skeins for size 48.  Gauge:  5 stitches and 5.5 rows per inch on size 7 US needle.  Also required are 7 3/4" shell buttons for decoration down the front.

4- MERINO SUPERWASH OPEN CABLED VEST- Materials are Karabella Merino superwash (see Karabella Yarns) color burgundy.  It requires size 10, 11, 12, 13 skeins for size 34, 37,40, and 43 as well as size 9 US (5.5mm) 32" circular needles and a cable needle

5- ATLANTE LACE UP TOP- From Fiber Trends is a lovely suppme topmadeof Atlante yarn (see Fiber Trends).  It is 100% bamboo and very soft.  I requires 7 skeins for 30-36, 8 for 38-40, 10 for 42-44 and size 3 US (3,25mm) needles.

name: TOTE PATTERNS
description:
1-Bobble bag is designed by Grayson E for GGH/Muench yarns, a well designed bag that carries it all.  The quality leather accessories are all handmade. It comes in a kit only.  Assembly may require extra knowledge in sewing.   The Kit includes 6 balls GGH Aspin –color- #41 Green; instructions; 1 set Grayson E large rolled leather handle; 1 Grayson E leather purse belt-color-olive; one set Grayson E leather base cups-color-olive; a clear plastic Knitting Nest tote.

2-SHEEP TOTE purse patterns from Fiber Trends are fun and fanciful.  They use 100% wool that will felt easily and firmly.  A good choice would be Iceland.  There is some needle felting to the sheep tote.  

3- The Gelato bag requires wool and mohair together. is a  Great gift for kids. 

4- MAGGIES FELT TOTE- This pattern is in two sizes and  uses bulky weight 100% wool yarn for the large tote and worsted weight for the small.  It is shown in Lambs Pride but Crystal Palace Iceland or Fjord works well.  It requires US size 10 1/2 (6.5 mm) for the small tote and 13 US (9 mm) needles for the large one.

name: DOG SWEATER PATTERNS
description:
1-Dog sweaters  that will provide thermal warmth as well as a good fit for “MANS BEST FRIENDS”.  Sock, DK, and sport weight yarn are required for this projects.  Yarn used for WALKING THE DOG is Falk by Dale of Norway (not listed on this site).  The sock pattern is a bonus part of the WALKING THE DOG pattern.  Very cute!  

2- Dandy Dog Sweaters- Any worsted weight yarn can be used for this patterns.

name: FELT STITCHERY PATTERNS
description: WAS $4.50 NOW $2.50!  Want to break-away from knitting for a while?  These are fun filled designs that bring enjoyment to your creativity.   The ornaments are made with DK weight and 100% wool for ease of felting.ust

name: PATTERNS FOR THE FEET
description:
1- Fast and easy are these felt clogs designed by Bev Galeskas for Fiber Trends.  Knit in double strand worsted weight yarn that is 100% wool for felting.  Get creative as shown in the second example.  2 strands of Iceland were used in the second example.  Needle felted figures were applied for fun.  

2- Sock, DK, and sport weight yarn are required for this projects.  Yarn used for WALKING THE DOG is Falk by Dale of Norway (not listed on this site).  The sock pattern is a bonus part of the WALKING THE DOG pattern.  Very cute!

name: SHAWL AND SHRUG PATTERNS
description:
1-SHRUG YOUR SHOULDERS  fits a wide range of body sizes.  ThIS first pattern uses a worsted weight yarn.  

2- SHRUG YOUR SHOULDERS uses fur, mohair or novelty yarns such Fizz, Kid Merino, or anything.   

3- GOSSAMER SHAWL WITH RUFFLE PATTERN- This is a one-size-fits-all shawl using 3 skeins of Karabella Gossamer Yarn.  It requires size 11 US 32 inch circular needles; a stitch holder.  Also this pattern is offered as a kit.  See kits.

4-GOSSAMER STOLE PATTERN- This one-size-fits-all stole is a lovely and elegant pattern using 2 skeins of Karabella Gossamer Yarn.  It is also offered as a kit.

5-PINEAPPLE LACE SHAWL PATTERN- This one-size-fits-all pattern requires 7 balls of Karabella Lace Merino.  Yarn gauge is 36 stitches and 26 rows per 4 inches and requires size 2 US needles.  This is a very luxurious finished product .

name: SCARF PATTERNS
description: We have a series of wonderful scarf patters from Fiber Trends.  They range from delicate lace to warm woolies.  Patterns can adapt to different weights of yarn.  Try Kid Merino, Waikiki, Flurries, and Demie pile for the lacy ones and Aron, Fjord, or Chloe for the more wooly scarves.

name: BEADED COIN PURSE KIT
description:
This coin purse project is a great introduction to beaded knitting.  It is a small project that can be completed in hours.  The kit includes a lovely embroidered case, 33 yards of sock yarn, 5 hanks of clear beads, purse handle with attached chain, and number 1 US (2.25mm) needles.  
Thread and needle are required.  This is an exclusive offer from The Knitting Nest.  
Note:  Due to the variation in yarn color, each purse will turn out slightly different from photo.

name: KNITTING NEST CLEAR PLASTIC TOTE
description:
THIS TOTE IS FREE WITH $25.00 PURCHASE!!!
At approximately 13" wide and 17" tall and featuring long brown handles for easy over-the-shoulder carrying, sturdy clear vinyl, a zipper opening, and the green Knitting Nest Logo, it is an all around great tote.  (Items in tote are not included).

name: WEAVING KITS
description:
1-The kit provides all the materials to weave a purse measuring 7" wide.  it is a project that is used with the LOOM IN A TUBE.

2-The kit # 2 is celtic pattern contains warp and weft yarn, delica beads, beading needletapestry bobin, and instructions for a celtic pattern.

name: LARGE BLACK BUTTONS
description:
The buttons are made of plastic, 4 hole, and actually 2 5/8 in diametor.  It looks like three.  they are from Karabella and the buttons used in the pattern A LINE JACKET in RUNWAY KNITS by
Berta Karapetyan.  The jacket is made with Karabella Puffy.  See BOOKS and KARABELLA YARN.

name: SOCK 1 KIT
description:
Was $55.00 now $35.00!  SOCK 1 KIT includes the ever instructional SOCK 1 DVD, written instructions, two US number 3 /20" circular needles, two skeins of 
Fortissima Colori from Schoeller and Stahl in colors multi blues and white, and a greatcleat plastic carring case.  It is a great value!

name: RUFFELED BEADED BRACELET
description: Create your own beautiful loom-woven beaded bracelet.  It comes with a fully illustrated step-by-step instructions that teaches basic bead weaving, beading needle, beads, beading thread.  To be used with the Loom In A Tube.

name: LUCITE PURSE HANDLES FOR $25.00
description: These purse handles are made of lucite and have inlay patterns.  They are beautifully crafted, come in pairs,  are large and thick with a very nice feel.  They would inhance any knitted bag by giving a rich quality to the project.  Sizes are listed below next to name.

options.name: 1-BLACK HANDLES WITH ROUNDS AND ROPE INLAY 6.5X4.5

name: NATURAL FIBER PURSE HANDLE
description: The pair of natural coconut string fiber purse handles measures about 13 inches long.  They have wood rings attached at both ends, made of sturty stong fiber and very plyable.  They have a fabulous look and will add to any handbag project

name: BURMUDA WOOD PURSE HANDLES
description:
Wood purse handles are beautifully crafted.  They all come in pairs. 
Made of dark wood.

name: PURSE HANDLES FOR
description: LUCITE PURSE HANDLES with sew holes come in 3 colors: black, tan, and clear.  We offer One pair for each color.   Great for knitted or beaded purse patterns.

name: SWEATER WIZARD
description: A MUST HAVE PROGRAM and the easiest to use!!!  This program generates schematics and text directions for sweaters customized to the knitter's specifications. Sweaters may be charted for flat or round knitting, using any gauge. Sweater Wizard is an excellent tool to quickly work up projects and instructions. System requirements: Windows 95, 98, ME, NT, 2000, XP (Vista compatible). Compact Disc.

name: SOCK WIZARD
description: Design your own sock patterns complete with good diagrams and yardage requirements. The Sock Wizard works in just three easy steps and gives you a wide variety of construction options, from double-pointeds to circulars. PC System Requirements: Windows 98, ME, NT, 2000, XP, (Vista compatible). Mac System Requirements: OS-X 10.4 or later. CD-ROM.

name: STITCH AND MOTIF MAKER
description: Stitch and Motif Maker is the easiest way to chart out color patterns or textured stitches. Whether you want to design your own motif or use an existing textured stitch. Stitch and Motif Maker allows you to draw in color or common knitter’s symbols. Specify how many rows and stitches you would like your pattern to cover and create a numbered grid. Pick from a palette of 74 colors or create custom colors. Choose from 87 familiar knitter’s symbols to chart stitches. Or, use both color and symbols together. System requirements: Windows 98, ME, NT, 2000, XP (Vista compatible and windows 7). Free update downloads are available at www.knittingsoftware.com.
